meanings.definition: A software application designed to perform a specific task on a computer or mobile device.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a new app to help me learn Spanish.
meanings.sent2: The weather app on my phone tells me if it will rain.
meanings.sent3: The app that counts how many times I blink is quite silly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an app that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The app for tracking my steps makes exercise more fun.

meanings.definition: To apply or put to use for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: I will app the sunscreen before going to the beach.
meanings.sent2: She decided to app her knowledge of coding to create a new website.
meanings.sent3: I apped some creativity to my outfit by adding a colorful scarf.
meanings.sent4: He apped determination to his studies, aiming for top grades.
meanings.sent5: The chef apped a pinch of salt to enhance the flavor of the dish.
